add_library(liblua
        include/lua/lapi.c
        include/lua/lapi.h
        include/lua/lauxlib.c
        include/lua/lauxlib.h
        include/lua/lbaselib.c
        include/lua/lcode.c
        include/lua/lcode.h
        include/lua/lcorolib.c
        include/lua/lctype.c
        include/lua/lctype.h
        include/lua/ldblib.c
        include/lua/ldebug.c
        include/lua/ldebug.h
        include/lua/ldo.c
        include/lua/ldo.h
        include/lua/ldump.c
        include/lua/lfunc.c
        include/lua/lfunc.h
        include/lua/lgc.c
        include/lua/lgc.h
        include/lua/linit.c
        include/lua/liolib.c
        include/lua/ljumptab.h
        include/lua/llex.c
        include/lua/llex.h
        include/lua/llimits.h
        include/lua/lmathlib.c
        include/lua/lmem.c
        include/lua/lmem.h
        include/lua/loadlib.c
        include/lua/lobject.c
        include/lua/lobject.h
        include/lua/lopcodes.c
        include/lua/lopcodes.h
        include/lua/lopnames.h
        include/lua/loslib.c
        include/lua/lparser.c
        include/lua/lparser.h
        include/lua/lprefix.h
        include/lua/lstate.c
        include/lua/lstate.h
        include/lua/lstring.c
        include/lua/lstring.h
        include/lua/lstrlib.c
        include/lua/ltable.c
        include/lua/ltable.h
        include/lua/ltablib.c
        include/lua/ltm.c
        include/lua/ltm.h
        include/lua/lua.h
        include/lua/lua.hpp
        include/lua/luaconf.h
        include/lua/lualib.h
        include/lua/lundump.c
        include/lua/lundump.h
        include/lua/lutf8lib.c
        include/lua/lvm.c
        include/lua/lvm.h
        include/lua/lzio.c
        include/lua/lzio.h
        )

target_include_directories(liblua INTERFACE include)
